job.title: Staff Software Engineer - Devops
job.industry: Retail,Health, Wellness and Fitness,Information Technology and Services
job.description: pLeads and directs in largescale complex crossfunctional projects by reviewing project requirements translating requirements into technical solutions Directs root cause analysis of critical business and production issues by reviewing and analyzing information for example issue impact criticality possible root cause directing actions as designated in the plan Promotes and supports company policies procedures mission values and standards of ethics and integrity by training and providing direction to others in their use and application ensuring compliance with them and utilizing and supporting the OpenDoor PolicyppbrppstrongAbout the teamstrongppWalmart Health WMH is on a mission to make Healthcare Affordable Convenient and Accessible We are the technology arm of WMH focused on building technology platform that will enable valuebased care and deliver better outcomes at lower cost for our customersnbspppAs an Engineer and Leader on the Walmart Health Technology team you will be working with cuttingedge technology to build a Point of Care platform that will be integrated with one of the leading EMR systemsnbspThe platform will empower our customers to access their personal and family health information and provide tools to live healthier At the same time this platform will help improve productivity of our healthcare providers so they can focus on delivering safe and highquality care at affordable pricesnbspppWe are looking for passionate engineers with the desire to disrupt the healthcare industrynbspA qualified applicant will be someone who app service or some code but Walmart has always been about people People are why we innovate and people power our innovations Being human led is our true disruptionnbspppbrppstrongWere virtualstrongppWorking virtually this year has helped us make quicker decisions remove location barriers across our global team be more flexible in our personal lives and spend less time commutingnbspToday we are reimagining the tech workplace of the future by making a permanent transition to virtual work for most of our team Of course being together in person is an important part of
